listitem.para: Read the license agreement, select "I accept the agreement" and click "Next".
Change the destination to "C:\Firebird\FlameRobin" and click "Next".
Change the start menu folder to "FlameRobin" and click "Next".
Check the "Create a desktop icon" and leave the "Create a Quick Launch icon" unchecked and click "Next".
The first time you launch FlameRobin you will be presented with the following window.

note.para: The fr_databases.conf file is particularly useful to ease the configuration of FlameRobin if the database was created by some other means than described in the following section or to restore the connection settings. It is an XML file that stores the file path of the database, username, password, character set and network connection settings. If the database already exists you can copy the file provided by the following link into your "C:\Documents and Settings\YourWindowsUsername\Local Settings\Application Data\flamerobin" folder: fr_databases.conf
